model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE SmallA (IntKey integer PRIMARY KEY OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'integer', NAMEINSOURCE 'intkey'), StringKey string OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'varchar(10)', NAMEINSOURCE 'stringkey'), IntNum integer OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'integer', NAMEINSOURCE 'intnum'), StringNum string OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'varchar(10)', NAMEINSOURCE 'stringnum'), FloatNum double OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'double', NAMEINSOURCE 'floatnum'), LongNum long OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'bigint', NAMEINSOURCE 'longnum'), DoubleNum double OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'double', NAMEINSOURCE 'doublenum'), ByteNum double OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'double', NAMEINSOURCE 'bytenum'), DateValue date OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'date', NAMEINSOURCE 'datevalue'), TimeValue time OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'time', NAMEINSOURCE 'timevalue'), TimestampValue timestamp OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'timestamp', NAMEINSOURCE 'timestampvalue'), BooleanValue boolean OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'boolean', NAMEINSOURCE 'booleanvalue'), CharValue char(1) OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'char(1)', NAMEINSOURCE 'charvalue'), ShortValue short OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'smallint', NAMEINSOURCE 'shortvalue'), BigIntegerValue double OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'double', NAMEINSOURCE 'bigintegervalue'), BigDecimalValue double OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'double', NAMEINSOURCE 'bigdecimalvalue'), ObjectValue string OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'varchar(65535', NAMEINSOURCE 'objectvalue')) OPTIONS (CARDINALITY 50, UPDATABLE 'TRUE', NAMEINSOURCE 'smalla'); model.name: BQT1
BQT2
VirtProcs
model.metadata: CREATE VIRTUAL PROCEDURE CountAllSmalla() RETURNS (SmallA_Count integer) AS BEGIN SELECT COUNT(*) AS SmallA_Count FROM BQT1.SmallA; END; CREATE VIRTUAL PROCEDURE AllSmallA() RETURNS (INTKEY integer NOT NULL, STRINGNUM string) AS BEGIN SELECT BQT1.SmallA.IntKey, BQT1.SmallA.StringNum FROM BQT1.SmallA; END; CREATE VIRTUAL PROCEDURE CountSmallA_Between(lo integer, hi integer, inclusive boolean) RETURNS (SmallA_Count integer) AS BEGIN IF(VIRTPROCS.COUNTSMALLA_BETWEEN.LO > VIRTPROCS.COUNTSMALLA_BETWEEN.HI) BEGIN ERROR 'The lower number must actually be lower than the high number. Equal is OK, too.'; END ELSE BEGIN IF(VIRTPROCS.COUNTSMALLA_BETWEEN.INCLUSIVE = TRUE) BEGIN SELECT COUNT(*) AS SmallA_Count FROM BQT1.SMALLA WHERE (BQT1.SmallA.IntKey >= VIRTPROCS.COUNTSMALLA_BETWEEN.LO) AND (BQT1.SmallA.IntKey <= VIRTPROCS.COUNTSMALLA_BETWEEN.HI); END ELSE BEGIN SELECT COUNT(*) AS SmallA_Count FROM BQT1.SMALLA WHERE (BQT1.SmallA.IntKey > VIRTPROCS.COUNTSMALLA_BETWEEN.LO) AND (BQT1.SmallA.IntKey < VIRTPROCS.COUNTSMALLA_BETWEEN.HI); END END END; CREATE VIRTUAL PROCEDURE SmallA_Between(lo integer, hi integer, inclusive boolean) RETURNS (INTKEY integer NOT NULL, STRINGNUM string) AS BEGIN IF(VIRTPROCS.SMALLA_BETWEEN.LO > VIRTPROCS.SMALLA_BETWEEN.HI) BEGIN ERROR 'The lower number must actually be lower than (or equal to, but this is goofy) the high number.'; END ELSE BEGIN IF(VIRTPROCS.SMALLA_BETWEEN.INCLUSIVE = TRUE) BEGIN SELECT BQT1.SmallA.IntKey, BQT1.SmallA.StringNum FROM BQT1.SmallA WHERE (BQT1.SmallA.IntKey >= VIRTPROCS.SMALLA_BETWEEN.LO) AND (BQT1.SmallA.IntKey <= VIRTPROCS.SMALLA_BETWEEN.HI); END ELSE BEGIN SELECT BQT1.SmallA.IntKey, BQT1.SmallA.StringNum FROM BQT1.SmallA WHERE (BQT1.SmallA.IntKey > VIRTPROCS.SMALLA_BETWEEN.LO) AND (BQT1.SmallA.IntKey < VIRTPROCS.SMALLA_BETWEEN.HI); END END END; CREATE VIRTUAL PROCEDURE Date_n_Time(keyIn integer) RETURNS (DnT string) AS BEGIN SELECT ((BQT1.SmallA.DateValue || ' --datetime-- ') || BQT1.SmallA.TimeValue) AS DnT FROM BQT1.SmallA WHERE BQT1.SmallA.IntKey = VIRTPROCS.DATE_N_TIME.KEYIN; END; CREATE VIEW vDate_n_Time(DNT string, IntKey_in integer) AS SELECT VirtProcs.Date_n_Time.DnT AS DNT, VirtProcs.Date_n_Time.keyIn AS IntKey_in FROM VirtProcs.Date_n_Time;

model.name: VQT
